Great video! Not sure if anyone will see this, but please ground down through your back foot between Warrior 3 and Half Moon. It's important to move from a closed to open hip with two feet on the floor to prevent excess exacerbation of the hip joints. This is how I flowed it: Warrior 3 > Crescent Lunge > Warrior 2 > Extended Side Angle > Half Moon. Stay well. <3
